analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#850-853) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#864-870)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#874-881)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#885-888)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#891-897)

Reentrancy in StageCrowdsale.isPreviousStageFinalized (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#519-530):
	External calls:
	- previousStage.isFinalized() (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#524-528)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- previousStageIsFinalized (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#525-528)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#301-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#304-305)

TokensRollStageCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#750-758) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(rollAddress,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#756-758)

Reentrancy in ManualTokenDistributionCrowdsale.manualSendTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#656-676):
	External calls:
	- super._deliverTokens(_beneficiary,_tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#668)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSoldCount (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#668-671)

Reentrancy in StageCrowdsale.proxyBuyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#495-519):
	External calls:
	- _preValidatePurchase(_beneficiary,weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#500)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#505-507)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#382-391) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#386)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#396-407) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/28/0xb2d9a445a34973c53f864e26425e465d922c9b78.sol#402-407)
